page.title: 14MY SCHOOL DAY Part 2
page.content: In the afternoon, we do topic work which I love. We find out about all sorts of things. We see films, go on visits, have people come to talk to us, use computer programs and books to do this work. Some afternoons we do games or P.E. and usually do some art work. We go home at 3.45 p.m. When I get home I like to play outside with my friends until dinner is ready. One evening a week I go to guides where we play games and do work for badges. If I stay at home, I watch the television, play on my computer or read a book. Sometimes I play a card game with my brother. At 9.00 p.m. I have a drink and go up to bed. I have my own room which I have decorated with lots of pictures of the pop group Wham! I usually read for a while before I go to sleep.
